input: goal: To make fake eyes for a project, you can [SEP] solution 1Take diamonds and color a pupil on them [SEP] solution 2Take ping pong balls and color a pupil on them

goal: To get Jello to completely dissolve. [SEP] solution 1Make sure you stir the Jello powder into boiling hot water to make sure it completely dissolves. [SEP] solution 2Jello powder will only completely dissolve if you stir it into ice cold water.

goal: How do get magnesium off a magnesium block? [SEP] solution 1Rub a file on the block and put the shavings on kindling. [SEP] solution 2Hit a hammer on the block and put the shavings on kindling.
goal: To get a strike in bowling, [SEP] solution 1knock down 10 pins with a single bowl. [SEP] solution 2knock down 8 pins with a single bowl.
goal: To install electric bulb in its holder. [SEP] solution 1Take the bulb and rotate it to fit in the bulb holder. [SEP] solution 2Put the bulb of your choice in the electric bulb holder.
